item.title: #100DaysToOffload
item.description: Writing is hard! Writing is hard, pouring one’s thoughts (some could say soul?) into a written form, then sharing it for the anyone to see. It the hardship begins before you even begin to write, what should you write about after all? What goal are trying to achieve? Will let’s try and figure this out! The Why Well, self improvement is a thing, and as much as I’d love to procrastinate indefinitely one must still move forward.
